## Source: ossf-package-analysis (55816d77f51cc9fc5c5fc18491df2693e7be82d2c4865402a52a85af9f685300)
The OpenSSF Package Analysis project identified 'hast-util-to-babel-ast' @ 20.1.2 (npm) as malicious.

It is considered malicious because:

- The package communicates with a domain associated with malicious activity.

- The package executes one or more commands associated with malicious behavior.
